message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your value on the product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me.  Would you consider $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
